title: Riot support ticket response time
body: Hey all, I was just wondering does anyone have any idea whats the average ticket response time?

replies.body: Depends on the team it's being fielded to, but I can check for you!  What's your ticket number?

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F2AHOi2b,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-13T20:27:02.275+0000)
>
> Depends on the team it's being fielded to, but I can check for you!  What's your ticket number?

okay sure my ticket number is (#31726082) , thank you so much by the way since my issue is really frustrating :D.

Got it!  I've confirmed your ticket was received yesterday and in queue for review.  Keep in mind there may be some investigation time, but a specialist will get back to you as soon as possible.  Hang tight!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=F2AHOi2b,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2017-09-13T20:39:33.877+0000)
>
> Got it!  I've confirmed your ticket was received yesterday and in queue for review.  Keep in mind there may be some investigation time, but a specialist will get back to you as soon as possible.  Hang tight!

okay sure thank you so much for your help and support and have a great day.
